content: the heel and the instep then pick up still without knitting the same number of sts along the second edge of the heel flap as on the first edge set up round knit picked-up stitches as a part of a set-up round for the gusset shaping k15/17/18 in chart b place sm repeat *k1 in c1 k1 in c2* to the last 15/17/18 sts knit the last st in c1 even if you will end w 2 sts in mc place sm k15/17/18 in chart b starting from st 2/2/1 on the instep continue chart b on the sole work gusset decreases as follows round 1 k15/17/18 in chart b slip sm work ssk my way in c1 work vertical stripes to the last 2 sts before sm k2tog in c1 slip sm k15/17/18 in chart b from st 2/2/1 round 2 and 3 knit all sole sts as established in chart b or as vertical stripes repeat rnds 1-3 until you have 33/36/39 sole sts 66/72/78 sts in total in size s and l you will have 1 unworked st between decreases 3 foot and toe continue chart b on all sts and remove markers when the foot measures about 6/6 5/7 cm 2 25/2 5/2 75 inches less than the desired total length change to smaller needles if you have used bigger needles in the colorwork knit 1 round in c1 then 1 round in c2 1 round in c1 1 round in c2 1 round in c1 and 1 round in c2 cut c2 and knit 1 round in c1 work toe shaping as follows round 1 on the instep k1 k2tog knit to the last 3 sts ssk my way k1 repeat on sole round 2 knit all sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 until you have 38/40/42 sts in total 19/20/21 sts on each needle knit only round 1 until you have 22/24/26 sts in total 11/12/13 sts on each needle cut yarn leaving a 30 cm tail use the kitchener stitch to graft remaining stitches together to keep the decreasing line during grafting treat the 2nd and 3rd sts on each side as one stitch and knit/purl both sts together knit the second sock using charts c1/c2/c3 and d instead of charts a1/a2/a3 and b copyright 2021 anna mäkilä all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only do not copy sell or distribute without permission key 4 chart a1 chart c1 chart a2 chart c2 5 chart a3 chart c3 chart b chart d 6
